body: @Taha-Bahadori Sure. Basically add the batched implementation in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorLapack.c#L758 (CPU) and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/c681b03d374e4010a875018c8a8a0485c40ceb9b/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathMagma.cu#L632 (CUDA) (you may need to write new / change existing size checks). Also, please add tests in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/c681b03d374e4010a875018c8a8a0485c40ceb9b/test/test_torch.py#L2047.
